newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian police make huge haul of counterfeit pens.
newsitem.headline: Russian police make huge haul of counterfeit pens.

text.p: French stationery manufacturer Societe BIC said Friday that Russian police had helped it seize more than a million Chinese forgeries of its Cristal ballpoint pen.
In a statement, the company said the haul, the third of its kind in Russia in recent months, had netted 1.3 million fake pens.
BIC, which also produces lighters and shavers, said the Russian authorities had confiscated 600,000 Chinese counterfeit items last July and a further 1.5 million items of Indian origin in October.
"These actions are accomplished to clean up counterfeits from the Russian market and give a quality product to customers," the statement said.
BIC plans to start producing disposable razors in Moscow in July.
